titleStmt.title: The rarities of Turkey, gathered by one that was sold seven times a slave in the Turkish Empire, and now exposed to view for the benefit of his native countrey:.
titleStmt.author: Georgijević, Bartolomej, d. ca. 1566.

notesStmt.note: Epistle dedicatory signed Bartholomeus Georgieviz, p. [10]
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
